question: I gave my wife all 3 talaaq's without witnesses. Days later we patched up and slept with each other. What is our situation, and if we wish to stay married what needs to be done, Shukran.
answer:
QUESTION
ANSWER


Share:
When a man gives his wife (conceived or not) three Talaaqs (verbally or in
writting) it is classified as Talaaq Mughllazah (literally meaning three
Talaaqs; whether these Talaaqs were issued in one sitting or on different
occasions), they are still valid and regarded as three.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
FATWA DEPT.
